original_text: And a second time I answered and said to him, “What are these two branches of the olive trees, which are beside the two golden pipes from which the golden oil is poured out?”
korean_text: 다시 그에게 물어 이르되 금 기름을 흘리는 두 금관 옆에 있는 이 감람나무 두 가지는 무슨 뜻이니이까 하니

sentences.original_text: And a second time I answered and said to him,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그에게 두 번째로 대답하여 이르되,

sentences.original_text: “What are these two branches of the olive trees,
which are beside the two golden pipes
sentences.korean_translation: 두 금 기름 통 곁에 있는,

sentences.original_text: from which the golden oil is poured out?”
sentences.korean_translation: 그것으로부터 금 기름이 쏟아져 나오는 것이니이까?”
